1   /**
2    * Support package for declarative JSR-107 caching configuration. Used
3    * by the regular Spring's caching configuration when it detects the
4    * JSR-107 API and Spring's JCache implementation.
5    *
6    * <p>Provide an extension of the {@code CachingConfigurer} that exposes
7    * the exception cache resolver to use, see {@code JCacheConfigurer}.
8    */
9   package org.springframework.cache.jcache.config;
